name: love
quotes:
• I am sorry, I love y'all, I am always going to be with you.
  • The girls on the row, I love them and keep their heads up.
  • I always said that if I even get to this point, I would have already said everything that needed to be said to all of those who I love and have been with me throughout this whole journey.
  • I would like to remind my children once again, I love them.
  • I say this with a lot of love and happiness.
  • Love life; live long.
  • All I have is love.
  • I know it doesn't mean anything; I told the truth because I feel like you should know who killed your loved one.
  • Over the years I have learned to love.
  • Know my love is always with you.

name: know
quotes:
• I'm sorry, I did not know the man but for a few seconds before I shot him.
  • Especially to the Police Officers, I know you probably hate me.
  • Uh, I don't know, Um, I don't know what to say.
  • I don't know why all of this happened.
  • I know ya'll love John Gomez but he was a violent man.
  • I am going to be ok; I know where I'll be.
  • I know you believe that you're going to have closure tonight and as I stand before God today, the true judge, I had nothing to do with the death of your family.
  • I know that is not going to eliminate the pain, because I have a child.
  • To my family, we've talked earlier and you know I'm at peace.
  • God is the ultimate judge, he knows what happened.

name: family
quotes:
• On the phone, I talked to my family for two hours.
  • To you and to my family, you don't deserve to see this.
  • My family is not here present and that is by my wish and my wish only.
  • Now you are all probably mad at me and I would probably be in the same situation you all in if anybody I thought killed anybody in my family ahh.
  • Sorry that I have to put my family through this.
  • Mankind is my family and tribe.
  • I asked my family to contact you, because they did no wrong.
  • First of all I want to thank God for the love; thank God for the love from the family and friends that I have.
  • I have done what I could to heal the rest of the family.
  • First of all, I would like to apologize to the Guajardo family even though they are not present.

name: thank
quotes:
• Yes, I do, uh at this time I would like to thank my parents who have been my pillar of strength throughout this.
  • First I would like to thank God for letting me see my family.
  • To all the fellows on death row, I thank you for the love that you have shown me and for the strength that you provided me.
  • I would like to thank all of you for coming.
  • I would also like to thank my pen pals, Joe and Camille Tilling and JoAnn for helping me stay strong all these years.
  • I thank my Father, God in Heaven, for the grace he has granted me – I am ready.
  • I want to thank the prosecutor in my case; it took courage for him to do what he did but he did what he did because he believed in the judicial system.
  • To the prison system, I would like to thank y'all.
  • I thank God that he died for my sins on the cross, and I thank Him for saving my soul, so I will know when my body lays back in the grave, my soul goes to be with the Lord.

name: want
quotes:
• I apologize for not being the man you wanted me to be.
  • It would take me an hour or a long time, man, but, ah, man, I don't want to hold y'all up, man, like that, ah.
  • I just really don't know what y'all want me to say.
  • I want you, I want to get my family and take this down to international court and file a law suit.
  • If it's alright, I just want to say a prayer first.
  • I mean ah, I don't want y'all to look at me like I am a killer or something man, cause I ain't no killer.
  • I just want to say two thing, executing someone that is innocent, cause even though I am.
  • I don't want nobody to be mad at nobody.
  • Please Lord, I don't want to be in Heaven, I mean I don't want to be in Hell.
  • I want the victim's family to know that I didn't commit this crime.

name: sorry
quotes:
• To my family: my old man, my kids, daddy is sorry.
  • I am sorry that I killed him, but he would not have been in prison if he was a saint.
  • So so sorry.
  • I'm sorry for all of you.
  • I just want everyone to know that the prosecutor and Bill Scott are sorry sons of bitches.
  • I'm sorry that I let you down.
  • I don't hold nothing against no one – Everyone has treated me well and I know it's not easy for them – That's all, I'm sorry.
  • I am man enough to show my emotions and I am sorry.
  • I can't be more sorry than I am right now.
  • I am here because I took a life and killing is wrong by an individual and by the state, and I am sorry we are here but if my death gives you peace and closure then this is all worthwhile.

name: forgive
quotes:
• Find it in your hearts to forgive me.
  • I forgive you and I hope you can forgive me.
  • For years I have never thought that I deserved any type of forgiveness.
  • Lord Jesus Christ in my life, I know He has forgiven me, I have accepted His forgiveness.
  • I am not asking for your forgiveness.
  • It's up to you if you would find it in your heart to forgive.
  • Yes, I want to start off by saying to everyone know that's involved in this atrocity that they are all forgiven by me.
  • I know Allah will forgive me, Allah is the forgiver.
  • And forgive us our trespasses, As we forgive those who trespass against us.
  • I don't require your forgiveness, because God has forgiven me.
  • I can't hear you. You may forgive me, and you may not.

name: say
quotes:
• Today, I realized that I can never say everything that needed to be said, because there is still so much that needs to be said.
  • I say this with love, I'm sorry.
  • I say this with a lot of love and happiness.
  • Yes, I want to start off by saying to everyone know that's involved in this atrocity that they are all forgiven by me.
  • I say I am worse off than a dog.
  • Warden, Since I don't have nothing to say, you can go ahead and send me to my Heavenly Father.
  • God help me to say this statement correctly.
  • Why do I say this, the Death Row is full of isolated hearts and suppressed minds.
  • Yes, nothing I can say can change the past.
  • I'll say when I see him: I'm sorry.

name: like
quotes:
• I wish this world is just like you.
  • I would like to say first and foremost to the Lord God Almighty that I am sorry and forgive me of every single solitary sin I have committed these 35 years I have lived upon this Earth.
  • I would like to sing, I would like to sing for that person's dead.
  • Here I am a big strong youngster, crying like a baby.
  • Yes, I do, uh at this time I would like to thank my parents who have been my pillar of strength throughout this.
  • We need to love each other like we used to.
  • I would like to say that Capital self defense is not Capital Murder.
  • I would like to give thanks for the unjust way my trial attorneys John Donahue and Frank Hollbrook purposely denied me a fair trial.
  • I have a good family, just like you have a good family.
  • I would like to say to the victim's family, if this goes on record, that I know they have gotten grief and I know with this execution, it will not be any relief to them.

name: God
quotes:
• (Singing) Our god is an awesome God.
  • God watches everything.
  • God has a plan for everything.
  • God knows I didn't want to do what I did.
  • I hope to God, He lets me see her in Heaven so I can apologize to her.
  • God blesses all the Texas Rangers, Texas Rangers.
  • I swear to God that I didn't kill her.
  • Thank you for this, my God is a God of Salvation.
  • God bless America, God bless everyone.
  • All I have to worry about is God forgiving me.

name: hope
quotes:
• I hope you have found God just like I have.
  • I asked the Lord to have mercy on me and I hope He has mercy on these people carrying out this mass slaughter.
  • I hope you don't find satisfaction in this, watching a human being die.
  • I hope this will touch your hearts like you have touched mine.
  • And now these three remain: faith, hope and love.
  • I hope you can move on after this.
  • Robert, don't forget what I told you: I hope that this serves as an example for the youngsters.
  • I hope people understand the grave injustice by the state.
  • I hope it helps a little.
  • I hope you can find it in your heart to forgive me.

name: tell
quotes:
• There is a drawing that I forgot to tell you about, send it to Stacy.
  • Synnova, tell everyone I got full on Chicken and Pork Chops.
  • I wish I could die more than once to tell you how sorry I am.
  • But, let me tell you something, there were two DNA tests run and none matched me.
  • Young people, listen to your parents; always do what they tell you to do, go to school, learn from your mistakes.
  • Tell them I finished strong.
  • I said I was going to tell a joke.
  • Did I ever tell you, you have dad's eyes?
  • Give mom a hug for me and tell her that I love her.
  • Come on, tell me Lord.

name: life
quotes:
• Live your life to the fullest, you only live your life once.
  • The best time in my life is during this period.
  • Take care of my kids and stay strong, life has to go on.
  • For me, live your life but don't hate me.
  • Life is death, death is life.
  • If ya'll don't have your life right, get it right.
  • Get your life right with Christ; it's coming to an end.
  • I couldn't do a life sentence.
  • I am grateful for everything in my life.
  • And know it is you, Jesus Christ, that is performing this miracle in my life.

name: Lord
quotes:
• Take my hand, Lord Jesus, I'm coming home.
  • Father Walsh, you have helped me so much to come to a knowledge of the Lord.
  • I fell like this is the Lord's will that will be done.
  • I hope the Lord will forgive me of all my sins.
  • Thank the Lord for the past 14 years that have allowed me to grow as a man.
  • I know that I am a Christ child and that my lord will welcome me into his arms.
  • My Lord is my life and savior, nothing shall I fear.
  • Lord Jesus, receive my spirit.
  • I just want to tell my family I love them, and I thank the Lord Jesus for giving me another chance and for saving me.
  • Thank you Lord for your mercy and unconditional love.
  • I thank the Lord for the man I am today.

name: people
quotes:
• Never, despite what other people say.
  • A lot of people say I didn't commit those murders, I really did it.
  • Little people always seem to get squashed.
  • There pain on both sides and it's not an issue that people just sit there and voice off and say, well, this is a good thing, or this is a bad thing.
  • You are great people.
  • I guess the only thing I have to say about the Death Penalty is that a lot of times people think of it as one sided, but it's not.
  • Life is about experience and people change.
  • I hope people understand the grave injustice by the state.
  • There are 300 people on death row, and everyone is not a monster.
  • We are all family, people of God Almighty.

name: see
quotes:
• I will see you on the other side.
  • I hope society sees who else they are hurting with this.
  • I look into my family's eyes, and I see sadness.
  • May the Lord God almighty in heaven, Jesus Christ see my spirit.
  • I wouldn't want to see you in my shoes.
  • If you look at the transcripts you will see.
  • It was good seeing the kids.
  • Take of yourself OK; you see I am doing good.
  • This person who did that 10 years ago isn't the same person you see today.
  • I wish you could have seen the videotape at the end of trial, so you could know the truth.
  • It was hard to see such a big man just break down and cry like a little baby.

name: peace
quotes:
• I have peace in my heart and ready for the next journey.
  • I am at peace.
  • Pray for me, for my soul, rest in peace.
  • I am at peace, we have no worries, just as I have no more worries.
  • I hope this brings you closure or some type of peace.
  • I can only ask that you have the peace that I do.
  • I am at peace; we know what it is.
  • But I pray my death brings peace for my family that may unite the family.
  • I hope you don't look for satisfaction or comfort or peace in my execution.
  • The peace you will find will be a temporary peace, true peace will come through find Christ.

name: here
quotes:
• I walked in here like a man and I am leaving here like a man.
  • God help you, because what you're doing here today and what's in your hearts here today makes you no better than any man or woman on death-rows across this country.
  • To be here on Texas death Row show all people that we people of American don't care about helping.
  • Now I lay here dead.
  • Ya'll do understand that I came here a sinner and leaving a saint.
  • Ya'll fought real hard here to prove my innocence.
  • I am out of here.
  • I was in there right now thinking how we grew up.
  • I know most of you are here to see me suffer and die but you're in for a big disappointment because today is a day of joy.
  • Ya'll do understand that I came here a sinner and leaving a saint.

name: friend
quotes:
• I am not the best father, the best son, or the best friend in the world.
  • Well, my friends in my heart, I'm ready.
  • To my lawyers, Danalyn and Robert Owen, you are not just my lawyers but you are my friends.
  • There is no kin and no friend; no fear what you do to me.
  • She was a friend of mine and I betrayed her trust.
  • To my friends, I'd like to say that I love you and I'm glad you've been a part of my life.
  • I feel like my punishment is over, but my friends are now being punished.
  • I want my friends to know it is not the way to die, but I belong to Jesus Christ.
  • Thank all of my friends on the row.
  • Goodbye to all my friends; be cool.

name: Jesus
quotes:
• Take my hand, Lord Jesus, I'm coming home.
  • I pray that Jesus will give you peace.
  • I would like to ask the Lord Jesus Christ for forgiveness and say that in spite of my circumstances, I have been blessed by him.
  • I want my friends to know that it is not the right way to die, but I belong to Jesus Christ.
  • I would like to thank my Lord Jesus Christ for keeping me strong all these years.
  • Jesus Christ is the Lord of Lords and the King of Kings.
  • I really do not believe that if Jesus were here tonight that he would execute me.
  • Lord Jesus Christ in my life, I know He has forgiven me, I have accepted His forgiveness.
  • Our Lord Jesus Christ, I commend myself to you.
  • Though Jesus Christ, we have vicotry over death.

name: pain
quotes:
• I have no pain and no guilt.
  • I know that is not going to eliminate the pain, because I have a child.
  • And if this takes the pain away, so be it.
  • Another mother got hurt, as a parent I understand the pain.
  • There pain on both sides and it's not an issue that people just sit there and voice off and say, well, this is a good thing, or this is a bad thing.
  • Hate causes a lifetime of pain.
  • No more pain and frustration.
  • I know ya'lls pain, believe me I shed plenty of tears behind Carlos.
  • My punishment is nothing compared to the pain and sorrow I have caused.
  • I don't deserve to cause you pain.

name: death
quotes:
• A revenge death won't get you anything.
  • I hereby sentence both of them to death, which I carried out in August 1998.
  • I don't fear death.
  • Life is death, death is life.
  • Even though I lay on this gurney, seconds away from my death, I am at total peace.
  • There are people on death row that need help.
  • There are 300 people on death row, and everyone is not a monster.
  • I do not want anybody to mourn my death, celebrate my life.
  • Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil; for thou art with me.
  • I know you believe that you're going to have closure tonight and as I stand before God today, the true judge, I had nothing to do with the death of your family.
  • My death began on August 2, 1991 and continued when I began to see the beautiful and innocent life that I had taken.

name: ask
quotes:
• I ask the good Lord to forgive me.
  • I asked the Lord to have mercy on me and I hope He has mercy on these people carrying out this mass slaughter.
  • I am not asking for your forgiveness.
  • I am asking you to go and give them hugs.
  • I can only ask that you have the peace that I do.
  • I ask each of you to lift up your voices to demand an end to the Death Penalty.
  • I am not strong enough to ask for forgiveness because I don't if I am worth.
  • I ask for forgiveness for all of the poison that I brought into the US, the country I love.
  • If I see your father I will ask him forgiveness.
  • First of all, I would like to ask Sister Teresa to send Connie a yellow rose.

name: strong
quotes:
• I'm strong.
  • Tell them I finished strong.
  • I would like to thank my Lord Jesus Christ for keeping me strong all these years.
  • And I am not as strong as I thought I was going to be.
  • If I could think of a word in the vocabulary stronger, you need to hear something stronger, you deserve it.
  • Stay strong.
  • I came into the world strong, and I'll leave the world strong.
  • Be strong in the Lord.
  • I am not strong enough to ask for forgiveness because I don't if I am worth.
  • And to everyone at the Polunsky Unit, just keep your heads up and stay strong.

name: kill
quotes:
• This is about destroying lives to show they can kill, but they hide behind laws of American.
  • I know it doesn't mean anything; I told the truth because I feel like you should know who killed your loved one.
  • You're gonna stop killing innocent kids, murdering young kids.
  • They want to kill me for this; I am not the man that did this.
  • I am sorry that I killed him, but he would not have been in prison if he was a saint.
  • Now you are all probably mad at me and I would probably be in the same situation you all in if anybody I thought killed anybody in my family ahh.
  • Like I've said from day one, I did not go in there and kill them - but I am no better than those that did.
  • If you had wanted to punish me you would have killed me the day after, instead of killing me now.
  • If I was y'all, I would have killed me.
  • You can kill a revolutionary, but you cannot stop the revolution.

name: heart
quotes:
• I hope you can find peace in your heart and happiness.
  • I have peace in my heart and ready for the next journey.
  • I thank you for all the things you have done in my life, for the ways that you have opened my eyes, softened my heart.
  • Please don't carry around that hurt in your heart.
  • There is no anger in my heart about this entire situation.
  • I hope this will touch your hearts like you have touched mine.
  • I ask that if Linda and Gary and their family can find it in their hearts to forgive me, but if not, I will understand.
  • My last words will be: And He was the light that shineth in the hearts of all man from the foundations of the world.
  • Keep clean hearts and I will see y'all on the other side.
  • We have so much to give when we give out of our hearts.

name: father
quotes:
• I never intended for your husband and father to be killed, it was just an accident.
  • If my life could bring your father back, then let it be.
  • Give him back his life, give back my father his life, and my mother her health.
  • I wish we could pray to Allah, the father of the universe.
  • There is nothing strange, love governs all events, what is (unintelligible), who is who was his mother and father, we extend my love to all my brothers and sister extend to life and my religion, it is Allah.
  • I am not the best father, the best son, or the best friend in the world.
  • I am responsible for them losing their mother, their father, and their grandmother.
  • If I see your father I will ask him forgiveness.
  • To my family and friends, father, sister and brother, those that have traveled so far to be here today, please just know that I am at peace.

name: years
quotes:

  • The last two years have been the best.
  • As of that time, the State of Texas has been holding me illegally in confinement and by force for 15 years.
  • Yes, I would like to tell my wife that I love her and thank her for all the years of happiness.
  • For years I have never thought that I deserved any type of forgiveness.
  • I am not locked up inside, all of these years I have been free.
  • I have been persecuted for 12 years for something I did not do.
  • The hardest part of all the years I was on death row.
  • Through the years of being in prison I come to hear and respect our life.
  • I am not the same person as I was 24 years ago.

name: happen
quotes:
• What happened between me and Rocky happended too fast.
  • I didn't know what happened.
  • God is the only witness that knows what happened that night.
  • To my beautiful daughter, the best thing that ever happened to me.
  • I am glad it happened this way.
  • He'll tell you the truth about what happened to your husband.
  • What happened was wrong.
  • Please forgive me, do not worry about what is going to happen.
  • What's happening now, you are suffering.
  • What is happening to me now is unjust and the system is broken.
  • None of this should have happened.

name: man
quotes:
• Don't lie, man.
  • I apologize for not being the man you wanted me to be.
  • I thank the Lord for the man I am today.
  • God help you, because what you're doing here today and what's in your hearts here today makes you no better than any man or woman on death-rows across this country.
  • Tommy Perkins, the man that got a capital life sentence for murdering Kinslow -- he did not do it.
  • No man in this world has had a better family than me.
  • I'm sorry I did not know the man but for a few seconds before I shot him.
  • I walked in here like a man and I am leaving here like a man.
  • Specifically, I want to say that the bad evil man I was when I came to death row 13 years ago is no more – by the power of God; Jesus Christ; God Almighty; Holy Spirit, he has transformed me as a new creature of Christ.
  • I am an innocent man, and something very wrong is taking place tonight.

name: cause
quotes:
• I never meant to cause ya'll so much pain.
  • Hate causes a lifetime of pain.
  • We caused a lot of heartache, grief, pain and suffering, and I am sorry.
  • I don't deserve to cause you pain.
  • I've caused you pain and grief beyond ever dreaming to cause someone of.
  • I realize that my actions have caused this death and a lot of pain and grief.
  • My punishment is nothing compared to the pain and sorrow I have caused.
  • I caused a lot of heartache, and I ask for your forgiveness.
  • I thank all of the people that have rallied to my cause.
  • For many years I have done things my way, which caused a lot of pain to me, my family and many others.

name: thing
quotes:
• Let's do this damn thing.
  • To my beautiful daughter, the best thing that ever happened to me.
  • The biggest thing I wanted to say was to you and family and I know I haven't had a chance to talk with ya'll in any form or fashion or way or manner.
  • If I had to do again, I would not change a thing.
  • The terrfying thing is the US is the only place, country that is the only civilized country that is free that says it will stop murder and enable justice.
  • It is the right thing to do.
  • The only thing I want to say is that I appreciate the hospitality that you guys have shown me and the respect; and the last meal was really good.
  • Love is the only thing for us.
  • Just remember the good things and not the bad.
  • I want you to take this thing off into international court, Mr.
  • You will continue to be string in everything that you do.

name: when
quotes:
• Tonight when I close my eyes, I'll be with my Father.
  • For all of you people, I defended myself when I killed your family member.
  • I am to blame for this, I will take that Lord, when I get there.
  • I know you weren't happy when I stopped my appeals, but you knewwhy.
  • I know when I die, I'll have life in heaven and life eternal everlasting.
  • I will be the first one you see when you cross over.
  • This is what happens to black men when they stand up and protest for what is right and just.
  • She will tell you that when she gets a chance to.
  • But when it comes out, I hope it stops this.
  • I'm ready when you are.

name: right
quotes:
• If ya'll don't have your life right, get it right.

  • Murder isn't right, killing of any kind isn't right.
  • It's not right to kill anybody just because I killed your people.
  • Everyone changes, right?
  • I can't be more sorry than I am right now.
  • He restoreth my soul; He guides me down the right paths.
  • This what is happening right now is an injustice.
  • First of all, you have every right to hate me and every right to want to see this.
  • It is the right thing to do.

name: brother
quotes:

  • Tell all the brothers to keep their heads up, eyes toward the sky.
  • Lord, thank you for all my family, all my friends, and all my brothers on the row.

  • Randy Greer, my little brother, I'll be watching you, stay out of trouble.
  • All of my brothers on death row, those who died and those who are still there, to hang in there.
  • To my brothers and sisters and all my family members who have supported me and who have loved me despite my faults and imperfections.
  • We've all lost grandpas, brothers, and sisters.

name: please
quotes:

  • I am at peace, please believe me.
  • If my words can persuade you to discontinue this practice of executing people, please do so.
  • And, please Lord, I confess my sins.
  • Warden I am ready to go home please.
  • All of you please.

name: ready
quotes:

  • Just know that I'm ready to go.
  • I am ready for the final blessing.
  • Thank you, Warden, Thank you Chaplain, Thank you God, I am ready to go.
  • I'm ready to teleport.
  • Peace, Freedom, I'm ready.
  • I'm ready Warden, send me home.
  • I am ready to begin my journey and that's all I have to say.
  • I have peace in my heart and ready for the next journey.

name: care
quotes:
• To be here on Texas death Row show all people that we people of American don't care about helping.
  • Take care of my kids and stay strong, life has to go on.
  • Be string and take care of yourselves.
  • Father I commend my soul, please take care and watch everybody I leave behind.
  • Take care of y'all.
  • Just because it happens, do not think that God doesn't care.
  • Does anyone care who I am.
  • Take care, give everybody my regards.
  • But it's all part of life, and my family, take care of yourselves.

name: now
quotes:
• I feel like my punishment is over, but my friends are now being punished.
  • I did wrong, now I am paying the ultimate price, even though it's a crooked way.
  • We know that Allah is with us now and forever.
  • I know you can't hear me now but I know that it won't matter what I have to say.
  • I did have, but now I see my family here and everything - all I have to say is I love you all so much.
  • Heavenly Father, as I come to you to praise and thank you that even now I can endure the pain that you endured when you died for me on the cross.

  • I appreciate y'all being here and being strong for me, and Mama, you know I love you, and I appreciate all of these visits, the letters and everything y'all have done for me.
  • Maurice, appreciate it, girl.
  • To my family, I appreciate you always standing by me and everything ya'll have done.

name: truly
quotes:
• I am truly sorry.
  • I am sincerely truly sorry.
  • I am truly repentant.
  • Only God will determine if I am truly guilty or innocent of being the type of person I have been drawn up to be by the press and media.
  • All of you, all of you have truly been the best.
  • I truly forgive all of y'all in Christ Jesus, we pray.
  • I truly believe that Jesus died for my sins that I may be resurrected, Lord, that you would do that much.
  • I see the press struggling to stay existent as a free institution One of the few truly free institutions is the press in Texas.
  • I do not know if this will ease your pain but I truly pray that this will help you find peace.
  • I am truly sorry, and there is not a day that I have not prayed for you.

name: Mr.
quotes:
• I say to Mr. Lambert's family, I did not kill Bobby Lambert.
  • I want you to take this thing off into international court, Mr. Robert Mohammed and all ya'll.
  • Okay, Mr. Johnson, you take care, let my Mama's will be done.
  • I hope this will allow you and your family to move on and I hope you will forgive me and I hope Mr. Hanon [illegible] will forgive me for taking his life
  • Continue the struggle for human rights, helping those who are innocent, especially Mr. Graham.
  • I would like to tell Mr. Richard that I appreciate all he has done for me
  • If you look at the transcripts, I didn't kill Mr. Newman and I didn't rob your house.
  • Tim Jackson, Bobby Dan Spade and Mr. Segal thank you for your lies. Your lies set me free. I couldn't do a life sentence.
  • Tell Bobby, Mr. Bear will be dancing for them.
  • To Mr. Jerry Nutt, I just hope this brings some kind of peace to your family.

name: feel
quotes:
• Thank you brother, don't hate nobody, I feel good.
  • I feel like I was upset and let down by them.
  • Can you feel me people.
  • I can feel it now.
  • And I understand your feelings.
  • I feel that I have to speak out against the practice of the death penalty, although I have no regrets in my case.
  • I know it doesn't mean anything; I told the truth because I feel like you should know who killed your loved one.
  • First and foremost I would like to tell the victims' families that I am sorry because I don't feel like I am guilty.
  • I feel like I am not a threat to society anymore.
  • I feel like my punishment is over, but my friends are now being punished.

name: son
quotes:
• But my death doesn't bring your son back - it doesn't bring closure.
  • Let my son know I love him.
  • I'm not he big son you wanted me to be.
  • Kick the tires and light the fire, I am going home to see my son and my mom, I love you and God Bless you.
  • I'm sorry, Teach, for not being a better son and not doing better things.
  • I'm sorry for shooting your son down at the particular robbery.
  • I just want everyone to know that the prosecutor and Bill Scott are sorry sons of bitches.
  • These two (unintelligible) to the masters of the temple of the son we have been honored to dwell in our father's house at least for the time in which this finite time has come to it's assigned time for one.
  • I wnat to tell my sons I love them; I have always loved them - they were my greatest gift from God.
  • Father, we are all here today for the mistake that I have made and I thank you for your mercy for sending your Son into this life, that we might come to know you, Father.

name: suffer
quotes:
• I would like to apologize for all of the pain and suffering I put you all through.
  • They have family too; the way they suffer is the way I am suffering.
  • Today is the day I'll be set free from all this pain and suffering.
  • I don't want you to suffer, I am not mad at you.
  • I know most of you are here to see me suffer and die but you're in for a big disappointment because today is a day of joy.
  • What's happening now, you are suffering.
  • I didn't mean to inflict the pain and suffering on your family.
  • They have suffered enough.
  • For all of the pain that I have caused, but all of this pain has brought us closer together and all of this suffering that we have been through has brought us all closer to the Lord and in the end that is what counts.
  • Yes I do, I know this no way makes up for all the pain and suffering I gave you.

name: think
quotes:
• Don't ever think you're perfect, none of us are perfect.
  • I don't hate nobody, you're doing what you think is your job.
  • I am not the malicious person that you think I am.
  • I don't think any good will come of this.
  • I was in there right now thinking how we grew up.
  • Cori, I think you should continue with criminal law.
  • I can't think of anything else.
  • There are people that will be mad thinking I try to seek freedom from this, but as long as I see - freedom belongs to me and I'll keep on keeping on.
  • I don't think you know the true reason for doing what I did, but Brandy and I had a suicide pact and I just didn't follow through with it.
  • Just because it happens, do not think that God doesn't care.

name: tonight
quotes:
• They are killing me tonight.
  • We must not let this murder / lynching be forgotten tonight, my brothers.
  • I pray that you will bring me home tonight.
  • They are murdering me tonight.
  • I hope whoever hears my voice tonight will turn to the Lord.
  • You are the people that must carry that revolutionary on, in order to liberate our children from this genocide and for what is happening here in America tonight.
  • This lynching will not stop us tonight.
  • Nothing more than state sanctioned murders, state sanctioned lynching, right here in America, and right here tonight.
  • Sorry for causing everybody such trouble tonight, Bruce, Joe, ya'll all treat me with respect I appreciate it.
  • I would like to see that wall that separates these groups here tonight brought down and that we would all have love and compassion for one another and that you all build a future for all of us.

name: mother
quotes:
• Another mother got hurt, as a parent I understand the pain.
  • Son, get your life right with Christ, also your mother.
  • I got my mother and my family too.
  • To my mother, I love you very much.
  • I would also like to thank my mother for standing by me all these years.
  • Like I said, I’ve called my mother already, so she knows.
  • To my mother, friends I would like to thank you for all that you have done for me.
  • Mother, I am sorry for all the pain I’ve caused you.
  • Tell my mother I love her and continue on without me.
  • Take care of my mother for me.

name: first
quotes:
• To my family, first and foremost - I love you all.
  • But first, I have to say something.
  • I would like to say first and foremost to the Lord God Almighty that I am sorry and forgive me of every single solitary sin I have committed these 35 years I have lived upon this Earth.
  • I will be the first one you see when you cross over.
  • Yes, first I would like to speak to the victims' family.
  • Let those without sin cast the first stone.
  • As I have said from the very first thing, I am innocent of this crime and God knows I am innocent and the four people that was murdered know I am innocent and when I get to heaven I'll be hunting you and we'll talk.
  • If it's alright, I just want to say a prayer first.
  • I would like to say first of all the real violent crimes in this case are acts committed by James Boswell and Clay Morgan Gaines.
  • My first thought is that Jesus Christ came down and separated the humans from God.

name: again
quotes:

  • If I had to do again, I would not change a thing.
  • To the victims again, I hate the way all of this happened to ya'll.
  • I am going to see ya'll again.
  • If I had it to do again, I would change Dwyer's parents suffering, because I know they are.
  • Thank you for showing me that I can be loved again.
  • And forgive us our trespasses, As we forgive those who trespass against us.
  • Please continue to struggle and fight against the death penalty, as its only use has been for revenge, and it does not deter crime.
  • To my family and friends, I love you and some day we will all be together again.
  • If you think I did this, you need to think again.
  • Let them know what has gone on and may we all see each other again.

name: hurt
quotes:

  • That letter she wrote wasn't wrong, she was just hurting.
  • Please don't carry around that hurt in your heart.
  • I hurt a lot of people with decisions I made.
  • I hurt the Lopes family, let this be a lesson.
  • This doesn't solve anything, 'cause it hurts others that love me.
  • I have said in interviews, if you want to hurt me and choke me, that's how terrible I felt before this crime.
  • I didn't mean to hurt you.
  • But I guess it only hurts for a little while.

name: understand
quotes:

  • I hope people understand the grave injustice by the state.
  • I have no reason for why I did it, I don't understand why I did it.

name: thy
quotes:

  • Thy kingdom come, thy will be done, on Earth as it is in Heaven.
  • There's no God but Allah, and unto thy I belong and unto thy I return.
  • I will pray with this man down here and we will go: Our Father, who art in Heaven, hallowed by thy name.
  • All Thy works shall praise Thy name, in earth, and sky, and sea; Holy, holy, holy, merciful and mighty!
  • Thy will be done.
  • Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil; for Thou art with me; Thy rod and Thy staff comfort me.

name: ok
quotes:

  • But that's ok I just played the hand that life dealt me.
  • Lord Jesus, I see your Spirit, it's ok I love you.
  • Okay, I've been hanging around this popsicle stand way too long.
  • I'm ok, I'm at peace with all of this and I won't have to wake up in prison anymore.
  • Everything is going to be ok.

name: name
quotes:

  • Christ rose again, in Jesus name.

  • Please, I ask that I rest in your arms in the name of Christ Jesus I pray this.

  • Lord, I lift your name on high.

name: last
quotes:

  • I spent the last twenty years waiting to figure out what's going on.

name: wrong
quotes:

name: ever

  • To my beautiful daughter, the best thing that ever happened to me.
  • Don't ever think you're perfect, none of us are perfect.

name: stand
quotes:

name: better
quotes:

  • No man in this world has had a better family than me.

name: part
quotes:

  • A little part of the letter touched me.
  • If my murder makes it easier for everyone else let the forgiveness please be a part of the healing.
  • I love you all and thank you for being a part of my life.
  • And I mean that from the deepest part.
  • But it's all part of life, and my family, take care of yourselves.
  • Therefore, I would forgive all who have taken part in any way in my death.

name: holy
quotes:
• We give praise to Allah the divine and holy prophet.
  • Holy, holy, holy! Lord God Almighty!
  • Allow your holy spirit to flow as I know your love as been showered upon me.
  • Oh, our Father who art in heaven, holy, holy, holy be Thy name.
  • All Thy works shall praise Thy name, in earth, and sky, and sea; Holy, holy, holy, merciful and mighty!
  • Early in the morning our song shall rise to Thee; Holy, holy, holy, merciful and mighty!

name: soul
quotes:
• I want you all to know, everyone with all my heart, soul, mind and strength.
  • Lord, have mercy on my soul.
  • Lord, have mercy on these peoples' soul.
  • I hold it in my soul.
  • Father please accept my soul.
  • He restores my soul; He leads me in the paths of righteousness for His name's sake.
  • You are all my heart and soul and I love you so much.

  • I ask God that he take all the hate out of my heart and away from my soul.
  • My love for you will remain with you winthin your heart and in part of your soul.

name: happy
quotes:
• I am happy.
  • I know you weren't happy when I stopped my appeals, but you know the reason why.
  • Don't be sad, I'm happy.
  • Be mindful that I am happy till the end.
  • Be happy.
  • Are you all happy?
  • As for me, I am happy, that is why you see me smiling.
  • If my life could make you happy, be free.
  • Smile, be happy don't cry.
  • But I am happy that I was afforded you all as family and friends.

name: closure
quotes:
• Trust me, killing me is not going to give you closure.
  • Not because I am here, but for closure in your hearts.
  • I am here because I took a life and killing is wrong by an individual and by the state, and I am sorry we are here but if my death gives you peace and closure then this is all worthwhile.
  • I know you all want closure.
  • I pray that you find closure and strength.
  • Collins family, I know your not going to get the closure you are looking for tonight.
  • I have made my peace with God and I pray that soon everyone will be able to have closure in their hearts and lives.
  • Politicians say that this brings closure.
  • But my death doesn't bring your son back - it doesn't bring closure.
  • There is no closure without love.

name: mean
quotes:
• By any means necessary, we keep marching forward.
  • I didn't mean for it to happen.
  • I mean, you know man.
  • I mean, I know how it look, but I didn't do it.
  • I made a mistake 18 years ago – I lost control of my mind but I didn't mean to hurt anyone.
  • This execution is one of those wrongs yet doesn't mean our whole system of justice is wrong.
  • I have never been mean-hearted or cruel.
  • I mean ah, I don't want y'all to look at me like I am a killer or something man, cause I ain't no killer.
  • The death penalty is an unnecessary punishment for society who has other means to protect itself.
  • And I mean that from the deepest part.

name: wait
quotes:
• To my family, I'll be there waiting for ya'll, alright?
  • I'll be waiting for you.
  • The guys back there waiting, keep the faith and stay strong and put your faith in the Lord.
  • He will be waiting in heaven for me.
  • I will be waiting for your arrival, don't disappoint me by not showing up.
  • God is waiting and God is waiting now.
  • They wait till the hearing was over and then make the arguments in the court or on paper where nobody can rebut it or contradict the testimony or arguments.
  • I will be waiting for you on the other side.
  • I wanted to wait for a thirty day stay for a DNA test so you know who did the crime.
  • I spent the last twenty years waiting to figure out what's going on.
  • I'll be there waiting for you but don't be in a hurry.
  • I will wait for you in Heaven.
